Specials below day advance purchase Travel April through August Roundtrip purchase and overnight stay required Purchase beginning March through March midnight PST Scroll down for more details at hotfaressrcclick Weekly Click n Save Specials These fares are valid for travel April through August except for May and Ticketless travel must be purchased online at wwwsouthwestcom by midnight Pacific Standard Time March Please see Other Terms and Conditions of these fares at the end of this email The fares listed do not include airportassessed passenger facility charges PFCs of up to roundtrip Roundtrip purchase and overnight stay are required Fares do not include a federal excise tax of that will be imposed on each flight segment of your itinerary A flight segment is defined as a takeoff tofrom San Antonio Southwest Airlines Click n Save Internet Specials Other Terms and Conditions Tickets must be purchased through the Southwest Airlines web site at The fares listed above are per person for each way of travel Click n Save Internet Specials require roundtrip travel and an overnight stay Fares listed are for general information only and are not a reflection of current seat availability Travel may originate in either direction Roundtrip travel must be between the same origin airport and the same destination airport Click n Save Internet Specials are nonchangeable and nonrefundable Ticketless Travel Online may only be purchased with a credit card Customers holding funds from a previously unused trip on Southwest Airlines or Customers who have Southwest Airlines vouchers will not be able to use those forms of payment for Ticketless Travel Online Click n Save Internet Specials may not be combined with any other fares Seats are limited and wont be available on some flights that operate during very busy travel times and holiday periods Any change to the reservation flights dates cities andor names of passengers once purchased will result in a fare increase Standby travel requires an upgrade to the full unrestricted fare Of course if your favorite city is not listed we have many other incredible fares to all Southwest cities To find more great fares on Southwest Airlines please visit Ticketless Travel Online or check our Fares Information online at Need a vacation Visit Southwest Airlines Vacations at indexhtm and book your vacation online Dont forget to check out the Thrilling Thursdays Weekly Specials for the hot deals of the week This is a post only mailing from Southwest Airlines Please do not attempt to respond to this message Copyright
